name: WebKite
tag_list: content-management, data-management, search, content, community-building, decision-making, seo, search-engine-optimization, information-publishing, data, dynamic-text
overview:
WebKite transforms data into a dynamic, interactive, intuitive website.

Servicing businesses small and large, WebKite is able to take information and turn it into the flexible and customizable content management platform.WebKite is built on the foundation of tools that can help a business in four distinct areas: user empowerment, community building, website growth, and brand alignment.

The WebKite platform educates and empowers users through decision tools and comparisons. Users can contribute to content and help build up a business’s brand by adding new items, creating lists, and correcting data. The WebKite platform comes equipped with community tools like built-in wikis, item ratings and reviews, social logins, and site feeds.

WebKite enables website growth through inherent SEO. For instance, a WebKite site with 1,000 items and 10 user-saved lists creates over half a million unique page that can rise to the top of search.

Webkite is a fully functioning website that can be themed to match your existing site or can stand on its own. Regardless of implementation, WebKite will reflect your brand.
